Title: QuickConverter
Description: QuickConverter provides you with WPF markup that allows you to write inline converters and multi-bindings using a C# like language directly in your xaml.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
QuickConverter provides you with WPF markup that allows you to write inline converters and multi-bindings using a C# like language directly in your xaml.

Even though QuickConverter compiles converter expressions at runtime, its use introduces very little overhead. QuickConverter takes advantage of expression trees and caching to make compilation of dynamically parsed expressions very efficient.  

QuickConverter is also available on NuGet.

As of version 0.7.6, QuickConverter's source is also hosted on SymbolSource.org. Follow the instructions here to enable source debugging in Visual Studio.
